column4: I can't do sudo apt-get update -f or sudo apt-get upgrade -f due to that msg
ok I can't because I don't know hoe to, I'm not running any of thT
it was not locked when I rebooted but then it said to do this E: dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'sudo dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem.
then I did that and the other error started to appear
How can I kill the process blocking the updates
I suppose you can use 'sudi lsof', and grep that list to see what, if anything, has that open.
I'm new to this, what is Grep
It just filters output to look for a specific string.  run 'man grep' if you're interested in details.
ok I just got a huge list
Yeah, so you'll wanna look through that list for /var/lib/dpkg
you can 'sudo lsof | grep dpkg' to pare it down some
I got this msg lsof: WARNING: can't stat() fuse.gvfs-fuse-daemon file system /home/alanis/.gvfs
